creditline: Gift of John and Beverly Rollwagen
markings: 'Question: How many times has Venus worn gloves? Choose one: A) Always. B) Never. C) Only when necessary to man's misunderstanding/ (C) Rita DeWitt 82' in graphite, below three small sheets; '10-82-1' in graphite, next to right edge of fight small sheet
medium: hand-colored electrostatic color prints (on four sheets)
title: Question: How Many Times Has Venus Worn Gloves?
